preference.name: initialCenter
preference.label: Initial Location
preference.description: Decimal coordinates where map will be centered on load (e.g. `52, 5`). Leave this setting empty if you don't want to center the map at init. Remember to change the initial zoom level if you provide an initial location.

preference.name: initialZoom
preference.label: Initial Zoom Level
preference.description: Initial zoom level. From 1 to 22, where '1' represents the furthest level and '22' the maximum zoom level.

preference.name: poiZoom
preference.label: PoI Zoom
preference.description: Zoom level applied when centering a PoI

preference.name: layerswidget
preference.label: Layers Widget
preference.description: Widget to use for allowing user to switch between layers
